root.name: The Legend of Heroes: A Tear of Vermillion
root.description: OverviewThe Legend of Heroes IV: Akai Shizuku (Tear of Vermillion) is the fourth entry in Falcom's Legend of Heroes RPG series and the second installment in the "Gagharv Triology." The game was originally developed and published by Falcom for the NEC PC-98 on March 24, 1996 with ports being released for the PlayStation in 1998 and PC in 2000. A remake of Legend of Heroes IV was created by Bandai and MiCROViSion Inc. for the PlayStation Portable in 2005 which was also released in North America the same year. The PSP remake was renamed to simply "The Legend of Heroes: A Tear of Vermillion" and was the first entry in the storied franchise to be localized into English.
